SEARCH
Package sh.brane.core.model

Record Class BlobTransactionRequest

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
sh.brane.core.model.BlobTransactionRequest
Record Components:
from - the address sending the transaction (may be null during construction, but required for signing)
to - the recipient address (required, cannot be null)
value - the amount of native currency to transfer, or null for zero
gasLimit - the maximum gas to use, or null to auto-estimate
maxPriorityFeePerGas - the miner tip for EIP-1559 fee market, or null
maxFeePerGas - the maximum total fee per gas, or null
maxFeePerBlobGas - the maximum fee per blob gas unit, or null
nonce - the transaction nonce, or null to auto-fetch
data - the transaction input data (calldata), or null
accessList - the EIP-2930 access list, or null/empty
sidecar - the blob sidecar (required, cannot be null)
public record BlobTransactionRequest(Address from, Address to, Wei value, Long gasLimit, Wei maxPriorityFeePerGas, Wei maxFeePerGas, Wei maxFeePerBlobGas, Long nonce, HexData data, List<AccessListEntry> accessList, BlobSidecar sidecar) extends Record
Request to submit an EIP-4844 blob transaction to the blockchain.

Blob transactions are used for data availability in rollups and other Layer 2 solutions. They carry blob data in a sidecar that is not included in the execution payload but is available for data availability verification.

Required Fields:

  • to - the recipient address (EIP-4844 does not support contract creation)
  • sidecar - the blob sidecar containing blobs, commitments, and proofs

Optional Fields:

  • from - may be null during construction but required for signing
  • value - amount of ether to send (defaults to zero)
  • gasLimit - estimated via eth_estimateGas if null
  • maxPriorityFeePerGas - fetched from network if null
  • maxFeePerGas - fetched from network if null
  • maxFeePerBlobGas - fetched from network if null
  • nonce - fetched from eth_getTransactionCount if null
  • data - transaction calldata (defaults to empty)
  • accessList - EIP-2930 access list (defaults to empty)
Since:
0.2.0
See Also:
  • Eip4844Transaction

    • toUnsignedTransaction

      public Eip4844Transaction toUnsignedTransaction(long chainId)
      Converts this request into an unsigned EIP-4844 transaction ready for signing.

      All required fields must be populated (no nulls except where noted). Use Brane.Signer to auto-fill missing fields before calling this method.

      Parameters:
      chainId - the chain ID for the transaction
      Returns:
      unsigned EIP-4844 transaction
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if required fields are null (from, nonce, gasLimit, maxPriorityFeePerGas, maxFeePerGas, maxFeePerBlobGas)
